title: Report: Cosby under criminal investigation in Pa.
text: FBI Report Sees Doubling Of Cop Killings in 2014 00:55 The number of on-duty U.S. law enforcement officers killed as a result of criminal acts nearly doubled in 2014 after a historically low number the year before. Fifty-one law enforcement officers were killed "as a result of felonious acts" in 2014, according to statistics released Monday by the FBI. ...
